ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬ÂºÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Âº        people while good King Richard is away on the Crusades. 
ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬ÂºÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Âº        Robin steals from the tax collectors, wins an archery contest, 
ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬ÂºÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Âº        defeats the Sheriff, and rescues Maid Marian. 
ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬ÂºÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Âº        In this version, however, Mel Brooks adds his own personal touch, parodying traditional
